definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解廣東省興寧市城鄉中小學生視力不良狀況。

sentences.english: The pupil divided the pencils by colour.
sentences.chinese: 這名小學生按顏色把鉛筆分類。

sentences.english: He disbursed the flowers to the pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他把鮮花分發給小學生們。

sentences.english: This book is a little past the pupil.
sentences.chinese: 這本書對小學生還有點費解。

sentences.english: Wearing lower degree convex lens can reduce incidence rate of myopia in primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 配戴低度凸透鏡可降低小學生近視的發生率。

sentences.english: Big boys sometimes domineer over the younger pupils.
sentences.chinese: 大男孩有時會蠻橫地對待較年幼的小學生。

sentences.english: The pupil buckled to the lesson.
sentences.chinese: 這名小學生認真做功課。

sentences.english: The pupils are sweeping away the snow.
sentences.chinese: 小學生們正在掃去積雪。

sentences.english: 70% of basic and secondary students use online learning portals.
sentences.chinese: 70%的中小學生使用網上學習站點。

sentences.english: The numerous students with pink and blue raincoats made the view very magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 中小學生方陣裏大家披着粉色和藍色的雨衣格外壯觀。

sentences.english: Free for individual primary and middle school student. (Visitor Ticket of Guangzhou Patriotism Education Base is required. )
sentences.chinese: 中小學生個人憑學生證按票價五折優惠。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of air pollution on non-special immunity function of pupils.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大氣污染對小學生非特異性免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: The pupil echoed his teacher's words.
Jack cycled too fast and almost ran down a school boy near the park.
sentences.chinese: 傑克車騎得太快了，在公園附近差一點撞倒一小學生。

sentences.english: Pre k - 6Th grade tutor, after school service.
sentences.chinese: 小學生家助教，愛心，優良環境。

sentences.english: The Longman Chinese Reader Series is written for Primary School students, focusing on the development of oral skills.
sentences.chinese: 《朗文小樹繪本叢書》爲幫助小學生學習口語而編寫。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]
